item.title: Xiaomi's latest flagship smartphone is the MIX Fold 2
item.description: Source: Xiaomi. The MIX Fold 2 is available in Black and Gold colourways. Xiaomi recently debuted its most advanced foldable phone, the Xiaomi MIX Fold 2, in Mainland China. The company also introduced the Xiaomi Pad 5 Pro, Redmi K50 Ultra, and a variety of other ecosystem devices. When unfolded, the Xiaomi MIX Fold 2 measures a mere 5.4mm1, providing a seamless viewing experience across its inner and outer screens.

item.title: Check Point has discovered a vulnerability in a preinstalled app on Xiaomi devices
item.description: Slava Makkaveev, a researcher from cybersecurity firm Check Point Software, recently discovered a concerning security flaw in Xiaomi phones. This vulnerability was found within the pre-installed “Guard Provider” app (com.miui.guardprovider), designed to identify malware. Ironically, this app could allow attackers on the same Wi-Fi network to perform a man-in-the-middle (MiTM) attack. This type of attack enables the interception and copying of data transmitted between the phone and online services. Furthermore, by exploiting a third-party software development kit (SDK) update mechanism, attackers could potentially disable malware protection and inject malicious code.

item.title: Less expensive smartphones are available for those in developing markets
item.description: To prepare for future growth, smartphone manufacturers are looking beyond China to other emerging markets. Although China represented a third of global smartphone shipments in 2013, the International Data Corporation (IDC) indicates this market is reaching its saturation point. IDC reports that smartphones constitute over 80% of China’s total phone sales. Consequently, they predict that India and Africa will be the primary sources of the next half billion smartphone customers.

item.title: The Xiaomi 13 Series makes its debut in Singapore
item.description: Source: Xiaomi Singapore. Pictured are the Xiaomi 13 Series phones (from left): Xiaomi 13 in white, Xiaomi 13 in Flora Green, and Xiaomi 13 in black. Xiaomi launched its latest top-tier smartphone series, the Xiaomi 13 Series, in Singapore. The Xiaomi 13 and Xiaomi 13 Pro are the result of a collaboration with Leica, aiming to redefine the smartphone photography landscape for users in Singapore. Developed in partnership with Leica, these flagship phones boast a triple camera system featuring Leica’s professional-grade lenses.
